alert.note: Alert for Calvert; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 21 at 11:23AM EST until November 22 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...St. Marys and Calvert Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest gusts will be along the immediate shoreline.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
